credit_line: Gift of Richard F. Holmes, Class of 1946
title: "A Gold Book by Andy Warhol"  [New York, 1957]. (Designed by Miss Georgie Duffie).  Bound artist's book in first issue gold boards, 40 pages with 19 plates.  Litho-offset and hand coloring on paper throughout.
medium: offset lithograph and hand coloring on paper
